descriptionHtml:
This is my first upload so please be nice :3

-----------------------------------------------------------
Background

This is Megan, A strong nord female who knows how to handle herself. She comes from a royal background and supports the imperials but hates the thalmor. She is sweet as could be but if you threaten her, you might aswell be dead 

----------------------------------------------------------
Details

Saved at helgen keep 


Mods used:                          Straight hair retexture 
                 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4333
                                              Coverwomen
                 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563
                                            

These mods are optional of course 

---------------------------------------------------------

Optional version comes with gold and ruby circlet as shown in picture
author: Wizbomb
